title: Sanserif font used on football jersey
content:
Hi,

I need some help identifying the font used on a wellington phoenix football shirt  
(name and number)... 'What the font' came up with Pakenham Cond Book which looked like a match except for the R - any help would be appreciated - thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202154255im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_4872.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202154255im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dodd_5748.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202154255im_/http:/typophile.com/files/McKain_5694.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202154255im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Smeltz_5142.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202154255im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Lockhead_4188.jpg)
author: perkynana
